entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Morrisburg
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 01:49 AM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 6:26 PM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Increasing cloudiness. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:26 PM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning in the evening. Risk of freezing rain. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 6:26 PM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Rain. High 8. Forecast issued 6:26 PM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 6:26 PM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 4. Forecast issued 6:26 PM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 8. Forecast issued 6:26 PM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of snow. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of snow. High plus 2. Forecast issued 6:26 PM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 6:26 PM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 5. Forecast issued 6:26 PM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 60 percent chance of showers. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 6:26 PM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. High plus 5. Forecast issued 6:26 PM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023
